channel.title: Performance Engineering on myPerfLab
channel.description: Recent content in Performance Engineering on myPerfLab

item.title: Welcome to myPerfLab
item.description: myPerfLab represents the first steps by Pallavi and Shubham to share their knowledge with the community. Through this initiative, they aim to provide insights and recommendations built on years of experience, varied project work, vivid reading & experimentation and continuous learning in performance engineering.
